page.title: 05OLD PLAYGROUND GAMES,WARBOYS
page.content: To play{Orange Balls},all join hands and go round twice singing{Orange {Balls ,Orange Balls ,here we go again. Then you have to sit down quickly. The last one to sit down goes over to a corner.The other people choose a boys name. You all walk round holding hands and saying you love(the boys name) and then you say stamp your feet if you love him and so on. To play{Over The Rainbow}someone is it and sings {Over The Rainbow, one, two, {three}or{un deux trois} and then does a straight handstand. In {Over the {rainbow jelly wobbles}you do a handstand and wiggle your legs. {Kissing in the parlour}is a skipping game with a long rhyme.You have to say how many babies did you have, then you have to say how many nappies did you have, and then you carry on with the rest of the rhyme.
